attributes.action: To authorise children time off school to clear head lice
attributes.additional_details: The school informed me that she could go to school with the lotion on but this makes the hair  look greasy and would then cause others to make fun of the child
attributes.background: myself as a parent have had to remove head lice from my child's hair which wasn't nice I got rid of them for her to go back the next day and get them again
